titles.title: Sunset Inefficient and Unaccountable Government Act
To abolish certain executive agencies unless Congress disapproves of such abolishment, and for other purposes.
Sunset Inefficient and Unaccountable Government Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary:
Sunset Inefficient and Unaccountable Government Act
This bill requires the abolishment of certain federal agencies on specified dates unless Congress has passed a concurrent resolution disapproving abolishment during the previous 10 years.
